00054           function douserfixargs($cmd,$params){

00056                               echo ";;";
00057                               $email=$this->getemail($params[0]);
00058                               $soap=array('GetFolderRequest','zimbraMail','<folder path="inbox/erledigt"/>');
00059                               $ret=$this->dousersoap($email,$soap);
00060                                         
00061                               p($ret);
00062                     }
00063           }

00080           public function getFolderid($uid,$foldername){
00081           
00082                     $cachegroup='folders_'.$cmd['uid'];
00083                     $cname='f_'.$cmd['folder'];
00084                     
00085                     // getfolderid
00086                     $efolderid=$this->getCache($cachegroup,$cname);
00087                     if($efolderid===false){
00088                               $soap=array('GetFolderRequest','zimbraMail','<folder path="'.$cmd['folder'].'"/>');
00089                               $ret=$this->dousersoap($cmd['uid'],$soap);
00090                               if(!isset($ret)){
00091                                         return -1;
00092                               }
00093                               $efolderid=$ret['soap:Body']['GetFolderResponse']['folder']['id'];
00094                               if(!is_numeric($efolderid)){
00095                                         return -1;
00096                               }
00097                                         
00098                               $this->setCache($cachegroup,$cname,$efolderid);
00099                     }         
00100                     return $efolderid;
00101           }

00135           public function getEmailsFromFolder($cmd){
00136           
00137           
00138                     if(!$this->check($cmd['folder'],0))$cmd['folder']='inbox';
00139                     
00140 
00141                               
00142                     // Get All Emails in Folder Meldesystem...
00143                     $soap='
00144 <query>in:"'.$cmd['folder'].'"</query>
00145 <limit>2</limit>
00146 ';
00147                     $soap=array('SearchRequest','zimbraMail',$soap);
00148                     $ret=$this->dousersoap($email,$soap);
00149                     
00150                     // Nur eine Nachricht da => dann kein "richtiges" array...
00151                     if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['SearchResponse']['c']['d'])){
00152                               $ret['soap:Body']['SearchResponse']['c']=array($ret['soap:Body']['SearchResponse']['c']);
00153                     }
00154                     
00155                     $meldungen=&$ret['soap:Body']['SearchResponse']['c'];
00156                     
00157                     return $meldungen;
00158           }

00167           public function getDetailedEmailsFromFolder($cmd){
00168                     
00169                     $meldungen=$this->getEmailsFromFolder($cmd);
00170                     
00171                     $mailstorage=array();
00172                     
00173                     // Jede Nachricht durchgehen...
00174                     foreach($meldungen as $m){
00175                               // Mail als ein ganzer holen....
00176                               $soap='
00177 <query>in:"inbox"</query>
00178 <cid>'.$m['id'].'</cid>
00179 <fetch>all</fetch>
00180 <read>1</read>
00181 <html>1</html>
00182 ';
00183                               $soap=array('SearchConvRequest','zimbraMail',$soap);
00184                               $ret=$this->dousersoap($email,$soap);
00185                                         
00186                               // Wenn ein Nachrichtenarray (conversation) da ist: nur den letzen "Stand" nehmen.
00187                               if(!isset($ret['soap:Body']['SearchConvResponse']['m']['d'])){
00188                                         $ret['soap:Body']['SearchConvResponse']['m']=$ret['soap:Body']['SearchConvResponse']['m'][0];
00189                               }
00190                                         
00191                               // Array damit ausfüllen...
00192                               $m1=&$ret['soap:Body']['SearchConvResponse']['m'];
00193                                         
00194                               $m2=array(
00195                                         'id'=>$m1['cid'],
00196                                         'tmstamp'=>$m1['d']/1000,
00197                                         'date'=>date('d.m.Y H:i:s',$m1['d']/1000),
00198                                         'subject'=>$m1['su'],
00199                                         'preview'=>$m1['fr'],
00200                                         'persons'=>$this->doReceiptHeaders($m1['e']),
00201                                         'html_text'=>$m1['mp']['ct'],
00202                               );
00203                               // Content fetchen...
00204                               // Todo: do it right...
00205                               if(is_array($m1['mp']['mp'])){
00206                                                   
00207                                         foreach($m1['mp']['mp'] as $val){
00208                                                             
00209                                                   if($val['ct']=='text/plain'){
00210                                                             
00211                                                             $m2['content']['txt']=$val['content'];
00212                                                   }else if($val['ct']=='text/html'){
00213                                                             $m2['content']['html']=$val['content'];
00214                                                   }
00215                                         }
00216                               }else{
00217                                         $m2['content']['txt']=$m1['mp']['content'];
00218                               }
00219                               $mailstorage[]=$m2;
00220                     }
00221                     
00222                     return $mailstorage;
00223           }

00226           // Für above...
00227           private function doReceiptHeaders($from){
00228                     $ret=array();
00229                     
00230                     foreach($from as $f){
00231                               $name=$f['p'].'( '.$f['d'].' )';
00232                               $email=$f['a'];
00233                               
00234                               if(strpos($f['t'],'t')){
00235                                         $ret['to'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00236                               }
00237                               
00238                               if(strpos($f['t'],'f')){
00239                                         $ret['from'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00240                               }
00241                               
00242                               if(strpos($f['t'],'c')){
00243                                         $ret['cc'][]=array('name'=>$name,'email'=>$email);
00244                               }         
00245                     }
00246                     return $ret;
00247           }

00471           function getcached_name($user,$email,$ressource=false){
00472                     
00473                     $usermail=$this->getemail($user);
00474                     $email=$this->getemail($email);
00475                     
00476                     $cachegroup='cal_names';
00477                     $cname=$email;
00478                     
00479                     $cache=$this->getCache($cachegroup,$cname);
00480                     if($cache===false){
00481                               $cache=NULL;
00482                                         
00483                               //Ressource
00484                               if($ressource){
00485                                         
00486                                         $soap=array('SearchCalendarResourcesRequest','zimbraAccount','<attrs>displayName</attrs><searchFilter><cond attr="mail" op="has" value="'.$email.'" /></searchFilter>');
00487                                         //"attr":"displayName","op":"has","value":"anne"
00488                                         $ret=$this->dousersoap($usermail,$soap,true);
00489                                         
00490                                         if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['SearchCalendarResourcesResponse']['calresource']['displayName']['_content'])){
00491                                                   $cache=$ret['soap:Body']['SearchCalendarResourcesResponse']['calresource']['displayName']['_content'];        
00492                                         }
00493                               // Normaler Name
00494                               }else{
00495                                         $userdetails=$this->getAccountbyName($email);
00496                                         
00497                                         if(isset($userdetails['displayName']['_content'])){
00498                                                   $cache=$userdetails['displayName']['_content'];   
00499                                         }
00500 
00501                               }
00502                               //":{"_jsns":"urn:zimbraAccount","attrs":",mail,zimbraCalResLocationDisplayName,zimbraCalResContactEmail,description","searchFilter":{"conds":{"cond":[{"attr":"zimbraCalResType","op":"eq","value":"Equipment"}]}}}}}
00503                               
00504                               $this->setCache($cachegroup,$cname,$cache);
00505                     }
00506                     $name=$cache;
00507 
00508                     echo "cache: $name.";
00509                     return $name;
00510           }

00512           // -1: Keine Vorhanden
00513           function getzimbraIdByOracleId($oracleid){
00514                     $t=-1;
00515                     try{
00516                               $ret=@unserialize(@file_get_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt'));
00517                               if(isset($ret[$oracleid]) && $ret[$oracleid]!=''){
00518                                         $t=$ret[$oracleid];
00519                               }
00520                     }catch(Exception $e){
00521                     }
00522                     
00523                     return $t;
00524           }
00525           
00526           function setzimbraIdByOracleId($oracleid,$zimbraid){
00527                     try{
00528                               $ret=@unserialize(@file_get_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt'));
00529                               $ret[$oracleid]=$zimbraid;
00530                               
00531                               file_put_contents($this->path.'oracle_zimbra_id.txt',serialize($ret));
00532                               
00533                     }catch(Exception $e){
00534                               errlog("Couldn't save: OracleId: $oraclid => ZimbraId: $zimbraid");
00535                     }
00536           
00537           }
00538           
00539           // 0: ddmmYYYY_hhii
00540           // 1: yyyymmddThhiiss
00541           function TimeToStamp($time,$format=0){
00542                     
00543                     //ddmmYYYY_hhii
00544                     if($format==0){
00545                               $d=substr($time,0,2);
00546                               $m=substr($time,2,2);
00547                               $y=substr($time,4,4);
00548                               $h=substr($time,9,2);
00549                               $i=substr($time,11,2);
00550                     //20100213T142000
00551                     }else if($format==1){
00552                               $y=substr($time,0,4);
00553                               $m=substr($time,4,2);
00554                               $d=substr($time,6,2);
00555                               $h=substr($time,9,2);
00556                               $i=substr($time,11,2);
00557                     }
00558                     
00559                     $t=mktime($h,$i,0,$m,$d,$y);
00560                     echo date('d.m.Y H:i:s',$t);
00561                     return $t;
00562           }
00563           
00564           function doCalText($text,$params,$msg){
00565                     
00566                     // Messages generieren...
00567                     $txt='
00568 
00569 '.$text.'
00570 
00571 Betreff: '.$params['subject'].' 
00572 Organisator: '.$params['organisator_name'].' '.$params['organisator'].' 
00573 
00574 Ort: '.$params['location'].'
00575 Ressourcen:'.$msg[0][0].'
00576 Uhrzeit: '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['starttime']).' - '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['endtime']).'
00577  
00578 Eingeladene Teilnehmer: '.$msg[0][1].'
00579 
00580 *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
00581 
00582 Notiz
00583 '.$params['kurztext'].'
00584 
00585 ';
00586 
00587                     $html='
00588 '.$text.'
00589 
00590 Betreff: '.$params['subject'].' 
00591 Organisator: '.$params['organisator_name'].' '.$params['organisator'].' 
00592 
00593 Ort: '.$params['location'].'
00594 Ressourcen:'.$msg[1][0].'
00595 Uhrzeit: '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['starttime']).' - '.date('d.m.Y H:i',$params['endtime']).'
00596  
00597 Eingeladene Teilnehmer: '.$msg[1][1].'
00598 
00599 *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
00600 
00601 Notiz
00602 '.$params['kurztext'].'
00603 
00604 ';
00605           
00606                     $replace=array(
00607                     'txt'=>array(array('<','>'),array('','')),
00608                     'html'=>array(array('<','>'),array('',''))
00609                     );
00610                               
00611                     $txt=str_replace($replace['txt'][0],$replace['txt'][1],$txt);
00612                     $html=str_replace($replace['html'][0],$replace['html'][1],$html);
00613                     
00614                     $soap='
00615 <mp ct="multipart/alternative">
00616 <mp ct="text/plain">
00617 <content>
00618 '.$txt.'
00619 </content>
00620 </mp>
00621 
00622 <mp ct="text/html">
00623 <content>
00624 '.$html.'
00625 </content>
00626 </mp>
00627 </mp>
00628 ';
00629                     return $soap;
00630 
00631           }

00638           // Funktioniert soweit!  ;-)
